Sentencas: We developed evaluation technologies for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells under pressurized conditions.
Titulo: Development of evaluation technologies for microtubular SOFCs under pressurized conditions

Sentencas: The pressurized cell evaluation system for the single cell was produced.
Titulo: Development of evaluation technologies for microtubular SOFCs under pressurized conditions

Sentencas: The chamber temperature of the evaluation system can be controlled up to 750 degrees C, and the maximum chamber pressure is 0.8 MPa.
Titulo: Development of evaluation technologies for microtubular SOFCs under pressurized conditions

Sentencas: It was possible to manually control the pressure difference between air andfuel gas within +/- 3 kPa during the pressure increase.
Titulo: Development of evaluation technologies for microtubular SOFCs under pressurized conditions

Sentencas: The hard sealing technique was introduced for the evaluation under pressurized conditions.
Titulo: Development of evaluation technologies for microtubular SOFCs under pressurized conditions

Sentencas: Using two different types of commercial inorganic ceramic adhesives, the gas leakage was controlled at approximately 2%.
Titulo: Development of evaluation technologies for microtubular SOFCs under pressurized conditions

Sentencas: Differential pressure control between fuel and air is effective for the stable open circuit voltage and power generation.
Titulo: Development of evaluation technologies for microtubular SOFCs under pressurized conditions

Sentencas: The power generation tinder pressurized conditions was successful at 650 degrees C, and the pressurized effect was clearly confirmed.
Titulo: Development of evaluation technologies for microtubular SOFCs under pressurized conditions
